fileVersion.description: The version number of the configuration file format.

version.description: The semantic version of the language module.

friendlyName.description: A user-friendly name for the language module.

description.description: A brief description or overview of the language module.

createdBy.description: The creator or author of the language module.

createdByURL.description: The URL linking to the creator's profile or information.

docsURL.description: The URL linking to the documentation for the language module.

downloadURL.description: The URL for downloading the language module, typically a release package or ZIP file.

updateURL.description: The URL for checking and fetching updates for the language module.

supportedPlatforms.description: An array listing the platforms supported by the language module.

language.description: The identifier for the programming language supported by the module.

libraryDirectories.description: Specifies additional directories where the language module can search for libraries.

forceLoad.description: Indicates whether the language module should be force-loaded by the Plugify core.
